title: Cannot Connect With Server
body:
I can log in, select champs and then when the game is loading, it endlessly loops "unable to connect with server". however, the match history shows my games (with me afk)

this only started happening yesterday

please help!

replies.body:
It sounds like something is blocking your connection from reaching the game server.  Download our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) and see if auto-configuring your firewall settings helps.  Test it in a custom game, though!

If not, run through the steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help get this resolved.  Let me know if you have any questions!

Aw bummer.  No worries, grab the logs from the HRT and attach it to a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).   Our tech team will be able to look into this with you directly!
